Name: Amity Rock
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Special Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Happiny, Chansey, and Blissey.  Swap a Blissey Song and a Blissey Card for an Amity Rock at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
